LoggingConfiguration: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><nlog xmlns="http://www.nlog-project.org/schemas/NLog.xsd" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" throwExceptions="true"><variable name="logDirectory" value="/app/logs/A365.ConfigService.Projection"/><variable name="logConfiguration" value="Development"/><targets><target name="console" xsi:type="ColoredConsole" layout="${longdate} ${logger} ${level} ${message}" /><target name="file" xsi:type="File" fileName="${logDirectory}/current.log" maxArchiveFiles="30" archiveFileName="${logDirectory}/{#}.log" archiveAboveSize="10485760" archiveEvery="Day" archiveNumbering="DateAndSequence" archiveDateFormat="yyyy-MM-dd" layout="${longdate} ${logger} ${level} ${message}"/></targets><rules><logger name="*" levels="Debug, Info, Warn, Error, Fatal" writeTo="console" /><logger name="*" levels="Trace, Debug, Info, Warn, Error, Fatal" writeTo="file" /></rules></nlog>
